data.text: @oGototheS I had a negative on Monday. By Tuesday it was positive and the PCR confirmed it. You’ll know if it’s COVID, it’s a proper bastard.

@superpaddiepads All my tests are negative but feel rough as. Ordered a PCR. See if that says different.
Hope you're back to feeling better very soon. Pleased that Rach & Sam are on the mend.

@oGototheS Everyone has to have it eventually and if you’ve been vaccinated then you’ll most likely just end up in bed for a week. It’s not pleasant at all, only on day 4 and still feeling really ropey. Rach & Sam are starting to show signs of improvement but I’m a few days behind them 🤷🏻‍♂️
@superpaddiepads Bit late replying to this but it's certainly getting around at the moment, which it was always going to do, wasn't it? I hope you're starting to feel better, day by day.
@AndieDelicacy Thanks Andie, really helpful advice. Got one being delivered tomorrow 👌🏽
@superpaddiepads I would. I got one for my parents last year. It wasn't particularly expensive, but worth it to keep an eye on your oxygen levels.
@AndieDelicacy I do not. Should I get one? Can see they’re on the usual outlets
@jenbren1976 Only on day 3, my throat feels like it’s been sandpapered 😞
